channel.title: [NONRENAMED]Hats/Helms Don't Work
channel.description:
This is what happens when I wear one:
http://img194.imageshack.us/i/headgv.jpg/
This is what happens when I wear one with an amulet or a weapon:
http://img194.imageshack.us/i/emmyt.jpg/
How can I get them to work like normal helmets or hats?
